dcterms:description: The dataset is collected for generic human-object interaction, comprising 174 categories such as 'Dropping something into something' and 'Pretending to open something without actually opening it'. It contains 108,499 videos in total, with 86,017 for training, 11,522 for validation, and 10,960 for testing.
dcterms:title: Something-Something

dcterms:creator: Twentybn
dcterms:description: The dataset is collected for gesture recognition, comprising 27 categories such as 'Swiping Left' and 'Pulling Two Fingers In'. It contains 148,092 videos in total, with 118,562 for training, 14,787 for validation, and 14,743 for testing.
dcterms:title: Jester
